Home.title: Nice to meet you!
Home.subtitle: I'm Ruan Gomes
Home.description: I'm a full-stack developer dedicated to crafting comprehensive solutions for digital challenges. From user interface to backend, I'm constantly seeking ways to make technology more accessible and efficient.
About.title: Why hire me?
About.description: As a Full Stack Developer, I bring expertise in building scalable, user-focused applications with a seamless front-to-back integration.
About.myEducationDescription: Here is a summary of my educational background, including academic degrees, online courses, and certifications.
Skills.title: My Skills
Skills.description: I've developed a diverse set of skills in front-end and back-end development, committed to delivering high-quality solutions for users and businesses.
AboutMe.title: About Me
AboutMe.description: I'm a Systems Analysis and Development student, passionate about full-stack development. I've honed my skills through academic projects and online courses, and I'm ready to tackle real-world challenges and apply my knowledge.
AboutMe.name: Name
Projects.description1: This project consists of a modern, responsive landing page, developed with a focus on attractive design.
Projects.description2: This project is an interactive, responsive dashboard, developed to visualize, monitor, and manage data.
Projects.description3: This project is a sign-up form, that allows users to subscribe by providing their email address and returning a confirmation message.
Projects.description4: A RESTful API for managing contacts, allowing users to efficiently create, read, update, and delete (CRUD) contact records and  authentication.
Projects.description5: Full-stack web application for task management with drag-and-drop functionality. Frontend built with React, TypeScript, and Tailwind, backend powered by Java with Spring Boot.
Projects.description6: Mobile system for inventory control, sales tracking, and supplier management with an intuitive interface.
Projects.description7: Mobile car rental application developed with React Native and TypeScript. Firebase integration for authentication and database, with payments via Mercado Pago.
Contact.title: Let's work together
Contact.subtitle: Get in touch with me to discuss how we can collaborate on your next project.
